name: WeTutor
overview:
WeTutor enables real teachers to provide great online tutoring.

The WeTutor platform is only available for U.S. classroom teachers who agree to follow tutoring best practices supported by the National Association of Independent Schools.

WeTutor offers tutoring to K-12 students in all subjects, including Math, Science, English, Social Studies, Languages and more, and has integrated a customized version of Dimdim as a “virtual classroom” offering whiteboards, video calling, document sharing and other learning tools. WeTutor tutors sell tutoring directly to parents.
